channel.title: auxin biosynthesis on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in auxin biosynthesis on funPlantGenes

item.title: ABF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs3g23480 Gene Symbol: ABF2 Gene Name: Genome: Reference genome of sweet orange Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: A model was proposed to illustrate how ABF2 mediates the ABA signalling involved in sucrose transport, chlorophyll degradation, auxin homoeostasis, carotenoid and ABA biosynthesis, and cell wall metabolism during citrus fruit development.

item.title: BAK1;bak4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb288130 Gene Symbol: BAK1 bak4 Gene Name: brassinosteroid insensitive1-associated receptor kinase 4 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: BBM1;OsASGR-BBML1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os11g19060 RAPdb gene ID: Os11g0295900 Gene Symbol: BBM1 OsASGR-BBML1 OsBBM1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: BrYUC6a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA02g041530 Gene Symbol: BrYUC6a Gene Name: YUC6a protein Genome: Species: Brassica campestris Functional Descriptions: In CST versus CKT, the auxin biosynthesis genes such as YUC6 were down-regulated, while the auxin transport and signal transduction genes were dysregulated.

item.title: BrYUC6b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA06g032880 Gene Symbol: BrYUC6b Gene Name: YUC6b protein Genome: Species: Brassica campestris Functional Descriptions: In CST versus CKT, the auxin biosynthesis genes such as YUC6 were down-regulated, while the auxin transport and signal transduction genes were dysregulated.

item.title: BrYUC6c
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA09g005830 Gene Symbol: BrYUC6c Gene Name: YUC6c protein Genome: Species: Brassica campestris Functional Descriptions: In CST versus CKT, the auxin biosynthesis genes such as YUC6 were down-regulated, while the auxin transport and signal transduction genes were dysregulated.

item.title: CmANR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmANR1 Gene Name: MADS-box TF Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Identified bric-a-brac, tramtrack and broad (BTB) and transcription adapter putative zinc finger (TAZ) domain protein CmBT1 as the interacting partner of CmANR1 through a yeast-two-hybrid (Y2H) screening library.

item.title: CsDUO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs1g03470 Gene Symbol: CsDUO1 Gene Name: DUO POLLEN 1 Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: The miR159a-DUO1 module regulates pollen development by modulating auxin biosynthesis and starch metabolism in citrus.

item.title: CsHEC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa4G639900 Gene Symbol: CsHEC1 Gene Name: HECATE1 Genome: Cucumber (Chinese Long) v2 Genome Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: We found that cucumber CsHEC1 is highly expressed in the fruit neck region and plays a positive role in fruit neck elongation.

item.title: CsULT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsULT1 Gene Name: ultrapetala transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Crocus sativus Functional Descriptions: Identification, cloning and characterization of an ultrapetala transcription factor CsULT1 from Crocus: a novel regulator of apocarotenoid biosynthesis.

item.title: CsYUC10b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa3G190380 Gene Symbol: CsYUC10b Gene Name: Genome: Cucumber (Chinese Long) v2 Genome Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsYUC10b promotes the formation of straight cucumber fruits, with possible applications in the production and breeding of cucumber.

item.title: FIB;TSG1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g07500 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0169800 Gene Symbol: FIB TSG1 OsFIB MHZ10 OsTAR2 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: FveYUC4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_2g29930 Gene Symbol: FveYUC4 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Fragaria vesca Functional Descriptions: Auxin biosynthesis gene FveYUC4 is critical for leaf and flower morphogenesis in woodland strawberry.

item.title: GhERF108
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D08G13101 Gene Symbol: GhERF108 Gene Name: Genome: TM-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor ERF108 interacts with AUXIN RESPONSE FACTORs to mediate cotton fiber secondary cell wall biosynthesis.

item.title: GmYUC2a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08g038600 Gene Symbol: GmYUC2a Gene Name: Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmYUC2a mediates auxin biosynthesis during root development and nodulation in soybean.

item.title: GmYUC2a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08g038600 Gene Symbol: GmYUC2a Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: We analyzed the YUCCA (YUC) gene family of soybean and identified GmYUC2a as an important regulator of auxin biosynthesis that modulates nodulation.

item.title: MdSINA11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD14G1054300 Gene Symbol: MdSINA11 Gene Name: E3 ubiquitin ligase 11 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: E3 ubiquitin ligases MdSINA4 and MdSINA11 regulate anthocyanin biosynthesis by targeting the IAA29-ARF5-1-ERF3 module in apple.

item.title: MeHSP90.9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Me18G012200 Gene Symbol: MeHSP90.9 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: This study highlights the dual regulation of SA and auxin biosynthesis by MeHSP90.

item.title: PbrARF13
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pbr016201.1 Gene Symbol: PbrARF13 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Pyrus bretschneideri Functional Descriptions: Auxin inhibits lignin and cellulose biosynthesis in stone cells of pear fruit via the PbrARF13-PbrNSC-PbrMYB132 transcriptional regulatory cascade.

item.title: PsPIN1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PsPIN1 Gene Name: auxin efflux carrier protein PIN1 Genome: Species: Pisum sativum Functional Descriptions: PsPK2 (the gene for a pea homolog of Arabidopsis PID , a regulator of PIN1 targeting), PsPIN1 (the major gene for a putative auxin efflux carrier) and LE (a gibberellin biosynthesis gene, GA3ox ), and also examined mutual hormonal regulation of these genes, in pea shoot tips, including a number of mutants.
